articles.title: New age of the asterisk? Integrity of elite sport under pressure as pandemic goalposts shift
articles.description: The positive COVID-19 test of cricketer Will Sutherland exposed a threat to the integrity of sporting competitions set to be repeated time and again over the coming months as Australia learns to live with COVID-19.
articles.content:
The positive COVID-19 test of cricketer Will Sutherland on Friday did more than delay the Sheffield Shield match between NSW and Victoria.
